name: Footer Cyclic Content Rotation
author: Neelam Singh

sections.description:
Footer Cyclic Content Rotation are made easy to display post content in footer section.

You can also use the handy Footer Cyclic Content Rotation use on default display.

Key Features

  • Responsive layout that looks great for mobile reservations and on all devices.
  • Footer Cyclic Content Rotation are user friendly.
  • Display latest contents.
  • Increase your site performance
  • Fully Mobile Responsive.
  • Free email support.
  • Minimun settings.
  • Quick & Easy To Use.
  • Easy To Implement

The Footer Cyclic Content Rotation plugin is an easy to use platform. Our plugin is designed to make latest post to take and effortless to manage. It removes the need for a complex system and it is very cost effective. It is simply designed to work with your venue

PLUG-N-PLAY

Footer Cyclic Content Rotation is built to work out of the box. Just activate it. Most of the settings have the predefined values and small descriptions.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘footer-cyclic-rotation-content’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

or

  1. Go to the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress and click ‘Add New’
  2. Search for ‘footer cyclic rotation content’ and select ‘Install Now’
  3. Activate the plugin when prompted

Getting Started

  1. To customize Others settings:

    • Go to the Settings area of the plugin admin and click the ‘Setting’ tab.
    • Also in the Settings area, go to the ‘Booking Schedule’ tab. There you’ll be able to set your restaurant’s schedule, the interval between booking slots, earliest and latest bookings and also create exceptions for the schedule.

  2. To set up layout alignment.

    • Go to the ‘settings’ tab.
    • Use the set roration time

For a list of specific features, see the Restaurant Menu description page here: https://wordpress.org/plugins/footer-cyclic-rotation-content/.

For help and support, please see:

  • Our FAQ page, here: https://wordpress.org/plugins/footer-cyclic-rotation-content/faq/

Privacy Notices

  • Please note, footer cyclic rotation content is not saving all your details. it’s display only your post contents.

Support Languages

  • English

  • support your site languauges

  • The footer cyclic rotation content Menu support forum, here: https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/footer-cyclic-rotation-content/
sections.faq:
Is there a shortcode to print the content?

No, shortcode.

Can I change the layout alignment of the date or time?

Yes, you can set left,right and center.
